symbols.name: sap.insights.CardHelper
symbols.description: Provides functionality for Insight cards CRUD operations.

properties.description: Show preview for Add Card With Search Dialog

methods.name: handleDndCardsRanking

returnValue.description: Returns an array of updated object

parameters.name: iDragItemIndex
parameters.description: card drag index

parameters.name: iDropItemIndex
parameters.description: card drop index

parameters.name: aCards
parameters.description: array of all cards

methods.description: Updates Cards Ranking in case of Drag & Drop of Cards

methods.name: showCardPreview

returnValue.description: Returns promise, which generates preview for the passed card manifest

parameters.name: oCard
parameters.description: card manifest for which preview will be generated

parameters.name: bTransform
parameters.description: boolean to determine whether card can be transfrormed

parameters.name: oCardMessageInfo
parameters.description: object which includes type and message text related to Message

parameters.name: sConfirmButtonText
parameters.description: text for confirm button on the dialog

parameters.name: onConfirm
parameters.description: callback event to be called when confirm button is pressed

parameters.name: onClose
parameters.description: callback event to be called when close button is pressed

methods.description: Show preview for a given card

symbols.name: sap.insights.CardProvider
symbols.description: This class is used to provide cards to consumers like SAP Collaboration Manager. It registers itself with the cards channel and shares available cards with interested consumers. It also handles requests for specific cards from consumers. It can be used to share cards with other applications or components that are interested in them

parameters.name: sId
parameters.description: unique ID to be used for registering the provider

parameters.name: aCards
parameters.description: An array containing available cards

methods.name: extend

parameters.name: sClassName
parameters.description: Name of the class being created

parameters.name: oClassInfo
parameters.description: Object literal with information about the class

parameters.name: FNMetaImpl
parameters.description: Constructor function for the metadata object; if not given, it defaults to the metadata implementation used by this class

methods.description: Creates a new subclass of class sap.insights.CardProvider with name sClassName and enriches it with the information contained in oClassInfo. oClassInfo might contain the same kind of information as described in {@link sap.ui.base.Object.extend}.

methods.name: getMetadata
methods.description: Returns a metadata object for class sap.insights.CardProvider.

methods.name: onCardRequested

parameters.name: sConsumerId
parameters.description: id of the requesting consumer

parameters.name: sCardId
parameters.description: unique ID of available card

methods.description: This method is called when a consumer requests a specific card. It checks if the consumer is registered and if the card exists in the shared cards. If both conditions are met it publishes the card to the consumer. If the consumer is not registered, it does nothing.

methods.name: onConsumerConnected

parameters.name: sConsumerId
parameters.description: id of the requesting consumer

methods.description: This method is called when a consumer connects to the cards channel. It checks if the card detail control is loaded, and if not, it loads it. Then it shares the available cards with the consumer and navigates to the card list page. If the card detail control is already loaded, it simply shares the available cards.

methods.name: onConsumerDisconnected

parameters.name: sConsumerId
parameters.description: id of the requesting consumer

methods.description: This method is called when a consumer disconnects from the cards channel. It removes the consumer from the list of consumers and stops sharing cards with it. If the consumer is not registered, it does nothing.

methods.name: onViewUpdate

parameters.name: bActive
parameters.description: true if the home page is currently being rendered.

parameters.name: aCards
parameters.description: An array containing available cards

methods.description: This method is called when the view is updated. It checks if the home page is currently being rendered and registers or unregisters the card provider accordingly.

constructor.description: Provides a communication between card providers and consumers in FLP and included iframes.

parameters.description: Object implementing the ICardProvider interface

methods.description: Request a card from a given provider.

methods.description: Request card creation to a given provider.

symbols.name: sap.insights.ManageCards
symbols.description: This control shows list of all user cards and allows perform actions like change visibility, change order. It also allows user to get preview of particular card, delete or copy.

properties.name: cardId
properties.description: Sets the cardId property which decides whether to render the details page or cardlist page, if cardId is provided , cardDetails page is rendered

constructor.description: Constructor for ManageCards. Accepts an object literal mSettings that defines initial property values, aggregated and associated objects as well as event handlers. See {@link sap.ui.base.ManagedObject#constructor} for a general description of the syntax of the settings object.

methods.name: clearPage
methods.description: Function to Clear Activities like navigation, filters

methods.name: extend

parameters.name: sClassName
parameters.description: Name of the class being created

parameters.name: oClassInfo
parameters.description: Object literal with information about the class

parameters.name: FNMetaImpl
parameters.description: Constructor function for the metadata object; if not given, it defaults to the metadata implementation used by this class

methods.description: Creates a new subclass of class sap.insights.ManageCards with name sClassName and enriches it with the information contained in oClassInfo. oClassInfo might contain the same kind of information as described in {@link sap.ui.core.Control.extend}.

methods.name: getCardId
methods.description:
Gets current value of property {@link #getCardId cardId}.

Sets the cardId property which decides whether to render the details page or cardlist page, if cardId is provided , cardDetails page is rendered

methods.name: getEnableResetAllCards
methods.description: Gets current value of property {@link #getEnableResetAllCards enableResetAllCards}. Sets enableResetAllCards property Default value is false.

methods.name: getMetadata
methods.description: Returns a metadata object for class sap.insights.ManageCards.

methods.name: navigateTo

parameters.name: oEvent
parameters.description: oEvent object

parameters.name: sPageId
parameters.description: page id to which to navigate to

methods.description: Function to navigate to the specified page, if no sPageId provided navigate to CardList by default

methods.name: setCardId

returnValue.description: Reference to this in order to allow method chaining

parameters.name: sCardId
parameters.description: New value for property cardId

methods.description: Sets a new value for property {@link #getCardId cardId}. Sets the cardId property which decides whether to render the details page or cardlist page, if cardId is provided , cardDetails page is rendered When called with a value of null or undefined, the default value of the property will be restored.

methods.name: setEnableResetAllCards

returnValue.description: Reference to this in order to allow method chaining

parameters.name: bEnableResetAllCards
parameters.description: New value for property enableResetAllCards

methods.description: Sets a new value for property {@link #getEnableResetAllCards enableResetAllCards}. Sets enableResetAllCards property When called with a value of null or undefined, the default value of the property will be restored. Default value is false.
